item.description:
An operational level wargame on carrier warfare in the WW2 Pacific theater. It covers from the raid on Pearl Harbor to the Battle of the Eastern Solomons, and also includes two fictional battles.

Players will control either carrier task force of the Imperial Japanese or United States Navy. Players manage fleet organization, fleet movement, search for the enemy and aircraft operations. Search system uses the dummy counters and the information chits.

The winner is determined by victory points based on damage inflicted to the opponent ships. Players also earn VP for strategic objective achieved or prevented.

Scenario
1. Attack on Pearl Harbor (Dec 7, 1941) Solo
2. Sinking of Prince of Wales and Repulse (Dec 10, 1941) Solo
3. Battle of the Java Sea (Feb 27, 1942) Solo
4. Carrier vs. Carrier (Fictional)
5. Battle of the Coral Sea (May 7-8, 1942)
6. Battle of Midway (Jun 4, 1942)
7.ã€€Battle of the Eastern Solomons (Aug 24-25, 1942)
8. General Fleet vs. Pacific Fleet (Fictional)
9. Battle of the Santa Cruz Islandsã€€(Oct 25-27, 1942) - Command Magazine Japan #15 and Japan Wargame Classics
10. Campaign of Solomons (1942) - Command Magazine Japan #15
11. Indian Ocean raid (Apr 5-9, 1942) - Command Magazine Japan #15 and Japan Wargame Classics
12. Assault on Solomons (1942) - Command Magazine Japan #15


Components (First edition)

 1 rulebook
 3 counter sheets (about 400 counters)
 7 map board (3 - 197 x 296 mm; 4 - 306 x 406 mm)
 2 reference cards
 2 fleet organization cards
 2 aircraft operation cards
 1 counter tray




First published as "World War Game (WWG)" series #8 by Epoch Co. in 1982.
Reprinted with Command Magazine Japan #10 in 1996.
Reprinted as Japan Wargame Classics #1 in 2009.
Reprinted as Historical Simulate War-games Series 004 (Chinese Version) by AURORA GAME STUDIO in 2019.
